subject: Java GUI test automation resources, was: Swing Testing
msgSnippet: I ve put a list of Java GUI-test-automation resources on my JUG s wiki http://www.superlinksoftware.com/cgi-bin/jugwiki.pl?TestingGUIs Feel free to
messageBody:
I've put a list of Java GUI-test-automation resources on my JUG's wiki

http://www.superlinksoftware.com/cgi-bin/jugwiki.pl?TestingGUIs

Feel free to append/modify. Note that the packages listed currently
only test AWT/Swing GUIs. I'm an SWT coder, manually regressing my
wizards, hoping to adapt something to SWT/JFace (despite the
resounding lack of interest from OTI--Erich Gamma, please help !-)

If anyone's interested in that effort, please post me, or check the
recent thread on

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/java-gui-testing/
